features: 【Multifunctional Dresser】This fabric dresser is perfect for bedrooms, wardrobes, nurseries, living rooms, hallways, dormitories and offices, and can also be used as a TV stand.
【For All Storage Needs】3 medium drawers are great for small items like socks, underwear; 2 large drawers are designed for large items like clothes, and blankets, which can make things more organized.
【Premium construction】 Made of metal frame and durable MDF wood top; cross support rods for added stability of the dresser；easy-pull wood handles for easy opening and closing of drawers
【Durable fabric】Removable drawers are made of premium breathable non-woven synthetic fabric on exterior and interior sides; Easy care - wipe clean with a damp cloth and air dry
【SAFE & EASY USE】The dresser measures 32.8 " L x 11.8" W x 30.3" H, It is easy to assemble within 20 minutes. Recommended to anchor the dresser to the wall for anti-tipping safety

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional and versatile furniture
reviews.reviewText: This is a high quality, nicely designed piece of furniture that is easy to assemble and versatile in usage. We currently live in an apartment and have been moving around. So we were looking for a dresser that is light weight, of less hassle in case we move again, and yet still able to perform well to the purpose. We found this one! The dresser is stable and sturdy. The fabric drawers/boxes are spacious for storing shirts, pants, towels or bedding linens--however you want it (of course you need to fold the items first--and I would recommend the kon mari way which helped me a lot!). We also love the smooth-feeling wooden handles. They definitely elevate the feel of the dresser to the more elegant expensive side. The height of the dresser compares to that of a normal desk. I placed it right next to my IKEA desk in the bedroom and use the surface as a little extension of my desk surface--which is always covered with books and papers. Some of those items are now neatly piled up on the dresser! One could also place the dresser comfortably in the closet. Despite all this wonderfulness the only little nuisance I have found so far is you can't leave a drawer hanging when pulled out like a normal wooden drawer. Somehow you need to hold it with the handle and take things from it by the other hand. The drawer can still balance about 1/3 pulled out, more than that it tends to tumble. Just be careful about this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little cabinet!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this as extra storage for my daughters closet. It was super easy to assemble (didn't really even need the directions). It is very sturdy and all the pieces were in perfect condition. It holds a lot more clothing than I anticipated it being able to, which is a good thing! The drawers are not perfect, you do have to adjust a little if you want them to all be the same when closed, but it's nothing I would really complain about. The colors and measurements were exactly as described as well. Very happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars May need to drill more holes
reviews.reviewText: PROS: It's fairly easy to put together, comes with everything you need (screws, L-wrench), I like the deep drawers, good height for what I needed it for. CONS: I had to drill a couple of extra holes in order to put it together the way the directions said. I guess the non-holes were missed during inspection?? It's not very sturdy, depending on what you are going to use it for. Not sturdy enough for a kids room or office files. Good for socks and t-shirts and such.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, sturdy and matches furniture perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is extremely well made. Really impressed with the rigid steel frame and how easy it was to put together. Sliding drawers are heavy fabric with a solid bottom section. Great for storing many items. Will be sliding leg casters on steel feet to kelp it move and slide. Well worth the price, cannot go wrong with this piece. The drawers sometimes don't go in even but a very small issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value. Very sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I wanted. It’s sturdy, easy to put together and it looks attractive. The cloth drawers can be a little annoying to pull out and push in but they’re well structured and thick. I’ll be purchasing more for random storage needs. I’m happy with it and I think it’ll last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so excited about my purchase..it has made a world of a difference in the boys bathroom. It is used to store towels and washcloths. Not to mentions other products stored on the shelf. I give this 10 stars⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very cute dresser but can't use the right drawers!
reviews.reviewText: This is such a cute dresser and perfect size to put in my closet, but am a little disappointed that I can't fully use it. I am not able to use the top two drawers on the right side because the right stand is the same as the left. There are no matching holes to insert the shelves. Also, there were no assembly instructions. Even though it was easy to assemble, it would still be nice to have instructions, as the whole time my husband and I were thinking we had assembled it incorrectly when it was really just packaged wrong. It also looks like we may have received a returned packaged, because one of the bags with all the bolts/screws was already ripped open when we opened up the box.
